casebody.data:
UNITED STATES of America, Appellee, v. James Lee WARD, Appellant. No. 9542. United States Court of Appeals Fourth Circuit. Argued Nov. 13, 1964. Decided Dec. 7, 1964. John E. Hall, North Wilkesboro, N. C. (McElwee & Hall, North Wilkesboro, N. C., on brief), for appellant. William H. Murdock, U. S. Atty. (Henry E. Frye, Asst. U. S. Atty., on brief), for appellee.

Before SOBELOFF, Chief Judge, BRYAN, Circuit Judge, and THOMSEN, District Judge.

PER CURIAM:

Finding no substantial error, the judgment will be

Affirmed.
